properties.areaDesc: Grand and Battlement Mesas; Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 1 at 2:41AM MST until January 3 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10
inches with locally higher amounts.

* WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas and Gore and Elk
Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys.

* WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to midnight MST Thursday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially over
mountain passes. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce
visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT MST THURSDAY NIGHT
